name: I Was Immediately Mistaken for a Monster Genius Actor
author: Jungseong Manyeo
content: One day, Kang Woo-jin suddenly gains the ability to enter a subspace when he reads a script or scenario, and to become the character himself through the subspace. And then, at an audition location where he followed his friend, he happened to show the acting he experienced through the subspaceâ€¦?
